alert.note: Alert for Alexander; Jackson; Perry; Pulaski; Union (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 6:53PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Perry, western Union, northwestern Pulaski, Jackson, Alexander, Scott, southeastern Perry and Cape Girardeau Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 653 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Daisy to near Oran. Movement was north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Scott City and Kelso around 705 PM CDT. Dutchtown and Cape Girardeau Airport around 710 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Cape Girardeau, Jackson, Gordonville, Trail Of Tears State Park, Willisville, Altenburg and Grand Tower. This includes Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 75 and 118. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
